snippet: For the revived Worldwide Music Play-In, classical musicians of all levels and all ages from the five boroughs joined players around the globe.
abstract: Classical musicians of all levels and ages from New York City's five boroughs join other players from around globe in Worldwide Music Play-In; event, founded in 1986 and sponsored by ACMP-The Chamber Music Network, has been revived in effort to attract new members to organization.
lead_paragraph: For the revived Worldwide Music Play-In, classical musicians of all levels and all ages from the five boroughs joined players around the globe.

headline.seo: New Yorkers Perform in Worldwide Play-In Weekend
headline.main: Musicians Old and Young, Experienced and Not, Join a Global Play-In

keywords.value: Chamber Music Center of New York
keywords.name: organizations
